creator: BY SPE sri lanka
descriptionHtml:
This is a Photo Editor. You can add Sinhala font characters, Sinhala Words to Photos and save them in your phone memory as a new copy.
Main Features :
+ Type Sinhala On Photos (Save as .jpg,.png,.gif).
+ you can Create Facebook Photo Posts and Facebook photo comments.
+ Add Funny TEXT to Your Photos in SINHALA.
+ Cut Image Background(erase background).
+ You can type Sinhala as Singlish or use Unicode keyboard(Helakuru Keyboard,etc...).
+ Add Visual Effects (Fire,Blood,lightning etc...VFX).
+ Draw by hand on Pictures.
+ Insert clip-arts,Stickers,Funny faces,Viber Stickers.
+ Get Photos From Videos(take pictures from video).
+ Style Sinhala Photos and can use custom Fonts from your storage.
+ Edit photos and TEXT with Shadows in English and Sinhala.
+ add Photos to Photo and zoom in out (PIP)
+ Make PNG layers
+ Make Animated GIF Files
+ Add Frames And borders To pictures
+ Add Effects To Your Pictures.(boost color,make then old,etc...)
+ Extra Flashlight function.
+ Copy Text For Sinhala SMS
+ 26 English Fonts and More Sinhala Fonts to Type Your Words and Sentences.
+ Add photos to mp3 cover pic.
+ You Can Use This App to Make Record Screen Capture Videos
+ Battery saving Video Camera Without Display.
+ Create Photos With Sinhala Quotes And Can Express your love feelings With Love Quotes.
+ You Can Download Extra Images and Can add your own Photos from your gallery too.
+ Can Share Your Photos written in Sinhala.
+ Wish For Your Love ones with custom Quotes Made by you.
+ As a Extra Function Can Backup APPS.
+ Write Songs In Sinhala Lyrics.
+ Color Splash Effect lets you selectively color your photos that are turned into Black and White Photos by using touch.(Color Touch)

චායාරූප මත සිංහල ටයිප් කරන්න. ෆේස්බුක් ඉමෝ විහිලු මුහුණු සාදන්න. පොටෝ කොමෙන් සාදන්න. ඔබේ වදන් ප්‍රකාශ කරන්න, චායාරූප මතට ඔබේ සිංහල වදන් ඇතුලත් කරන්න. ආදරය ප්‍රකාශ කරන්න චායාරූප මත. ඩේටා අවශ්‍ය නැත. සම්පූර්ණයෙන් නොමිලේ. චායාරූප මත Sindu ලියන්න.

descriptionShort: 💫Write Sinhala On photos, Create Sinhala Photo Comments, Rage Faces, Cut Photos
title: Photo Editor Sinhala

creator: BY SPE sri lanka
descriptionHtml:
This is a Photo Editor. You can add Sinhala font characters, Sinhala Words to Photos and save them in your phone memory as a new copy.
Main Features :
+ Type Sinhala On Photos (Save as .jpg,.png,.gif).
+ you can Create Facebook Photo Posts and Facebook photo comments.
+ Add Funny TEXT to Your Photos in SINHALA.
+ Cut Image Background(erase background).
+ You can type Sinhala as Singlish or use Unicode keyboard(Helakuru Keyboard,etc...).
+ Add Visual Effects (Fire,Blood,lightning etc...VFX).
+ Draw by hand on Pictures.
+ Insert clip-arts,Stickers,Funny faces,Viber Stickers.
+ Get Photos From Videos(take pictures from video).
+ Style Sinhala Photos and can use custom Fonts from your storage.
+ Edit photos and TEXT with Shadows in English and Sinhala.
+ add Photos to Photo and zoom in out (PIP)
+ Make PNG layers
+ Make Animated GIF Files
+ Add Frames And borders To pictures
+ Add Effects To Your Pictures.(boost color,make then old,etc...)
+ Extra Flashlight function.
+ Copy Text For Sinhala SMS
+ 26 English Fonts and More Sinhala Fonts to Type Your Words and Sentences.
+ Add photos to mp3 cover pic.
+ You Can Use This App to Make Record Screen Capture Videos
+ Battery saving Video Camera Without Display.
+ Create Photos With Sinhala Quotes And Can Express your love feelings With Love Quotes.
+ You Can Download Extra Images and Can add your own Photos from your gallery too.
+ Can Share Your Photos written in Sinhala.
+ Wish For Your Love ones with custom Quotes Made by you.
+ As a Extra Function Can Backup APPS.
+ Write Songs In Sinhala Lyrics.
+ Color Splash Effect lets you selectively color your photos that are turned into Black and White Photos by using touch.(Color Touch)

descriptionShort: Write Sinhala On photos, Create Sinhala Photo Comments, Rage Faces, Cut Photos
title: Sinhala Photo Editor

creator: SPE Sri Lanka
descriptionHtml:
This is a Photo Editor. You can add Sinhala font characters, Sinhala Words to Photos and save them in your phone memory as a new copy.
Main Features :
+ Type Sinhala On Photos (Save as .jpg,.png,.gif).
+ you can Create Facebook Photo Posts and Facebook photo comments.
+ Add Funny TEXT to Your Photos in SINHALA.
+ Cut Image Background(erase background).
+ You can type Sinhala as Singlish or use Unicode keyboard(Helakuru Keyboard,etc...).
+ Add Visual Effects (Fire,Blood,lightning etc...VFX).
+ Draw by hand on Pictures.
+ Insert clip-arts,Stickers,Funny faces,Viber Stickers.
+ Get Photos From Videos(take pictures from video).
+ Style Sinhala Photos and can use custom Fonts from your storage.
+ Edit photos and TEXT with Shadows in English and Sinhala.
+ add Photos to Photo and zoom in out (PIP)
+ Make PNG layers
+ Make Animated GIF Files
+ Add Frames And borders To pictures
+ Add Effects To Your Pictures.(boost color,make then old,etc...)
+ Extra Flashlight function.
+ Copy Text For Sinhala SMS
+ 26 English Fonts and More Sinhala Fonts to Type Your Words and Sentences.
+ Add photos to mp3 cover pic.
+ You Can Use This App to Make Record Screen Capture Videos
+ Battery saving Video Camera Without Display.
+ Create Photos With Sinhala Quotes And Can Express your love feelings With Love Quotes.
+ You Can Download Extra Images and Can add your own Photos from your gallery too.
+ Can Share Your Photos written in Sinhala.
+ Wish For Your Love ones with custom Quotes Made by you.
+ As a Extra Function Can Backup APPS.
+ Write Songs In Sinhala Lyrics.
+ Color Splash Effect lets you selectively color your photos that are turned into Black and White Photos by using touch.(Color Touch)

චායාරූප මත සිංහල ටයිප් කරන්න. ෆේස්බුක් ඉමෝ විහිලු මුහුණු සාදන්න. පොටෝ කොමෙන් සාදන්න. ඔබේ වදන් ප්‍රකාශ කරන්න,චායාරූප මතට ඔබේ වදන් ඇතුලත් කරන්න. ආදරය ප්‍රකාශ කරන්න චායාරූප මත. ඩේටා අවශ්‍ය නැත. සම්පූර්ණයෙන් නොමිලේ. චායාරූප මත Sindu ලියන්න.
